modName: Menu Song Three Hearts As One
summary: Replaces the main menu theme with Three Hearts As One by Malukah
descriptionHtml:
Replaces the main menu theme with Three Hearts As One by Malukah this way you can download any main menu background but still change the song All song rights go to Malukah who released this song for free go check her out: https://www.malukah.com/free/

Install after Main Menu Mods and allow replacement!!
author: Dexials
